title: Commission Regulation (EEC) No 3140/92 of 29 October 1992 fixing for the 1992/93 marketing year the Community offer price for broad-leaved (Batavian) endives applicable with regard to Spain and Portugal
header:
COMMISSION REGULATION (EEC) No 3140/92  of 29 October 1992  fixing for the 1992/93 marketing year the Community offer price for broad-leaved (Batavian) endives applicable with regard to Spain and Portugal
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN  COMMUNITIES
main_body:
For the 1992/93 marketing year, the Community offer price for broad-leaved (Batavian) endives (CN code 0705 29 00) applicable with regard to Spain and Portugal, expressed in ecus per 100 kilograms net of packed products of Class I, of all  sizes, shall be as follows:
- from 15 November 1992 to
31 Jauary 1993: 57,30,
- from 1 February 1993 to
31 March 1993: 60,01.
This Regulation shall enter into force on 15 November 1992. This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 29 October 1992. For the Commission
Ray MAC SHARRY
Member of the Commission
(1) OJ No L 363, 13. 12. 1989, p. 3. (2) OJ No L 362, 27. 12. 1990, p. 16. (3) OJ No L 366, 29. 12. 1990, p. 43.
